name: Warrior Greaves
description: This pair of Warrior greaves have a simple design for the typical warrior and adorned by rivets.  The top of this medieval leg pad ensures comfort and safety and the classic design makes this tibia protector ideal for any larp....

name: Persian Greaves
description: This set of steel Persian greaves was designed to protect your calves and ankles during larp battle. The combination of chainmail and metal plates give an authentic period look and give you full coverage and can be matched to fit almost any costume.

name: Ratio Leg Protection
description: The Ratio Leg Protection is an awesome piece larp leg armor that can fit with most any armor. The combination of steel and leather makes this pair of leg armor an awesome fit to any gear. Feel free to customize your characterâ€™s costume with this fully articulated leg guard.

name: Viking Leg Protection
description: This pair of aged Viking Leg Protection will protect your legs during the next raid.  These bent metal strips are riveted to three strong leather straps with buckles and have a leather stitched trim for added protection.  Any Norse adventurer will appreciate such a fine crafted piece of armor, making your character every more powerful.

name: Floating Knees Epic, Dark
description: This pair of floating knees grant the wearer a great deal of mobility during Larp events.  The articulated lamed flex and bend with the natural movement of the leg providing the necessary movement during battle.

name: RFB Arm and Leg Protection
description: The RFB arm and leg set is a basic pair of protection intended for the price conscious warrior. The simple design and polished metal surface makes this ensemble perfect for any novice going to his first battle.

name: RFB Leg Protection
description: This pair of RFB leg protection is the basic model intended for the price conscious warrior.  The simple design and polished metal surface makes this set of greaves perfect for any novice going to his first battle. The rounded edges ensure safety towards the wearer as well as the opponent making this pair of tibia protectors larp ready.

name: Floating Knees
description: This pair of floating knees grant the wearer a great deal of mobility during Larp events.  The articulated lamed flex and bend with the natural movement of the leg providing the necessary movement during battle.

name: Black Ice Full legs
description: The black ice leg harness is an efficient way to protect your upper legs, which is useful when on the battle field. This pair of steel leg pads fully adjusts to fit most warriors and they are fully functional. Shin guards not included.

name: Undead Arm and Leg Protection
description: The undead arm and leg set works against the forces of good and protects the wearer from harm. The blackened metal symbolizes soulless corruption.

name: Black Ice Arm and Leg Set
description: The black ice arm and leg set works against the forces of evil and protects the wearer from harm. A unique style with a raised pattern with a black center piece and adjustable leather straps.

name: Undead Full Legs
description: This leg set has an articulated knee and can be worn by undead warlord. This upper leg set is light weight and fits most anyone.

name: Full Gothic Leg Harness
description: The gothic leg harness provides excellent protection covering the upper leg and the knee from blows.  This gothic leg protection has a fully articulated knee and a plate at the top provides excellent flexibility.  All the edges on the parts of this harness have been folded to prevent injury and a large leather belt and loop system allows you to fasten...

name: Enclosed Leg Protection
description: This pair of greaves is fully enclosed in case you feel that more protection is needed.  A back plate and knee guard is installed using thick leather straps which attaches to your leg like regular greaves.  Then the back plate can be closed to fully protect your leg during any epic battle.One Size

name: Dark Drake Greaves
description: This pair of Dark Drake greaves have a simple design for the typical warrior and adorned by rivets and coated in a durable epic dark finish. The top of this medieval leg pad ensures comfort and safety and the classic design makes this tibia protector ideal for any larp and the raised pattern enhances the overall look....

name: King Greaves
description: Our pair of King greaves have a nice raised pattern design for the flashy warrior. The top of this medieval leg pad ensures comfort and safety and the classic design makes this tibia protector ideal for any larp and the raised pattern enhances the overall look....

name: Warrior Greaves, Dark
description: Our pair of Dark Warrior greaves have a simple design for the typical warrior and adorned by rivets and coated in a durable epic dark finish. The top of this medieval leg pad ensures comfort and safety and the classic design makes this tibia protector ideal for any larp....

name: Persian Greaves, Dark
description: This awesome pair of darkened Persian greaves reach from below the knees to your ankles, providing complete protection on your lower legs. Designed for larp combat, larges metal plates are linked together by chainmail and are secured by thick leather straps.
